text: The Country Mouse and The City Mouse Adventures, otherwise referred to as The Country Mouse and the City Mouse for short, is a Canadian and French animated television series. It was Co-Produced by CINAR Films and France Animation. ==Broadcast == CBeebies (UK) Canal J and France 3 (France) Playhouse Disney (Southeast Aisa France And Spain) EBS (Korea) Television 13 (South Korea) TV12 (Singapore) TVOnartio YTV and Ici Radio-Canada Télé (Canada) YLE (Finland) VBC (Vietnam) ==References== Category:1998 Canadian television series debuts Category:1999 Canadian television series endings Category:Canadian animated television series
title: The Country Mouse and the City Mouse Adventures
